trans-unit.source: use_legacy_sql - (Optional) Specifies whether to use BigQuery's legacy SQL for this view. The default value is true. If set to false, the view will use BigQuery's standard SQL.
trans-unit.target: use_legacy_sql -（可选）指定是否为此视图使用BigQuery的旧版SQL。默认值是true。如果设置为false，则视图将使用BigQuery的标准SQL。

trans-unit.source: use_msi - (Optional) Set to true to authenticate using managed service identity. It can also be sourced from the ARM_USE_MSI environment variable.
trans-unit.target: use_msi -（可选）设置为true以使用托管服务身份进行身份验证。也可以从 ARM_USE_MSI 环境变量获取它。

trans-unit.source: use_ntlm - Set to true to use NTLM authentication, rather than default (basic authentication), removing the requirement for basic authentication to be enabled within the target guest. Further reading for remote connection authentication can be found here.
trans-unit.target: use_ntlm -设置为 true 以使用NTLM身份验证，而不是默认值（基本身份验证），从而消除了在目标来宾中启用基本身份验证的要求。有关远程连接身份验证的更多信息，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: use_octavia - (Optional) If set to true, API requests will go the Load Balancer service (Octavia) instead of the Networking service (Neutron).
trans-unit.target: use_octavia -（可选）如果设置为 true ，则API请求将转到负载均衡器服务（Octavia），而不是网络服务（Neutron）。

trans-unit.source: use_opsworks_security_groups - (Optional) Boolean value controlling whether the standard OpsWorks security groups apply to created instances.
trans-unit.target: use_opsworks_security_groups -（可选）布尔值，控制标准OpsWorks安全组是否应用于创建的实例。

trans-unit.source: use_org_from_zone - (Optional) Takes a zone name value. This is used to lookup the organization ID that owns this zone, which will be used to configure the API client. If org_id is also specified, this field will be ignored. This can also be specified with the CLOUDFLARE_ORG_ZONE shell environment variable.
trans-unit.target: use_org_from_zone -（可选）获取区域名称值。这用于查找拥有此区域的组织ID，该ID将用于配置API客户端。如果还指定了 org_id ，则该字段将被忽略。也可以使用 CLOUDFLARE_ORG_ZONE shell环境变量来指定。

trans-unit.source: use_policy_based_traffic_selectors - (Optional) If true, policy-based traffic selectors are enabled for this connection. Enabling policy-based traffic selectors requires an ipsec_policy block. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: use_policy_based_traffic_selectors -（可选）如果为 true ，则为此连接启用基于策略的流量选择器。启用基于策略的流量选择器需要一个 ipsec_policy 块。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: use_policyfile (boolean) - (Optional) If true, use the policy files to bootstrap the node. Setting policy_group and policy_name are required if this is true. (defaults to false).
trans-unit.target: use_policyfile (boolean) -（可选）如果为 true ，则使用策略文件来引导节点。如果为 true ,则需要设置 policy_group 和 policy_name 。（默认为 false ）。

trans-unit.source: use_private_network - (Optional) Attach/detach the private network interface to/from the new server. Can be true or false (default).
trans-unit.target: use_private_network -（可选）将专用网络接口与新服务器连接/分离。可以为 true 或 false （默认值）。

trans-unit.source: use_public_network - (Optional) Attach/detach the public network interface to/from the new server. Can be true (default) or false.
trans-unit.target: use_public_network -（可选）将公共网络接口与新服务器连接/分离。可以为 true （默认）或 false 。

trans-unit.source: use_remote_gateways - (Optional) Controls if remote gateways can be used on the local virtual network. If the flag is set to true, and allow_gateway_transit on the remote peering is also true, virtual network will use gateways of remote virtual network for transit. Only one peering can have this flag set to true. This flag cannot be set if virtual network already has a gateway. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: use_remote_gateways -（可选）控制是否可以在本地虚拟网络上使用远程网关。如果该标志设置为 true ，并且远程对等上的 allow_gateway_transit 也为 true ，则虚拟网络将使用远程虚拟网络的网关进行传输。只有一个对等方可以将此标志设置为 true 。如果虚拟网络已具有网关，则无法设置此标志。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: use_ssl - (Optional) Whether or not to use SSL to reach the backend. Default false.
trans-unit.target: use_ssl -（可选）是否使用SSL到达后端。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: use_static_mac - (Optional) If true, the mac_address field is treated as a static MAC address and set accordingly. Setting this to true requires mac_address to be set. Default: false.
trans-unit.target: use_static_mac -（可选）如果为true，则将 mac_address 字段视为静态MAC地址，并进行相应设置。将此设置为 true 需要设置 mac_address 。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: use_subdomain - (Optional) Should the Custom Domain Name be validated by using indirect CNAME validation?
trans-unit.target: use_subdomain -（可选）是否应该使用间接CNAME验证来验证自定义域名？

trans-unit.source: use_sudo (bool) - (Optional) Use sudo when executing remote commands. Required when the user specified in the connection block is not root. (Defaults to true)
trans-unit.target: use_sudo (bool) -（可选）在执行远程命令时使用 sudo 。当 connection 块中指定的用户不是 root 时，这是必需的。（默认为 true ）

trans-unit.source: use_tls - (Optional) Whether to use TLS for secure logging. Default false.
trans-unit.target: use_tls -（可选）是否使用TLS进行安全日志记录。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: use_tls - (Optional) Whether to use TLS for secure logging. Defaults to true
trans-unit.target: use_tls -（可选）是否使用TLS进行安全日志记录。默认为 true

trans-unit.source: valid_after - The key can be used after this timestamp. A timestamp in RFC3339 UTC "Zulu" format, accurate to nanoseconds. Example: "2014-10-02T15:01:23.045123456Z".

trans-unit.source: valid_before - The key can be used before this timestamp. A timestamp in RFC3339 UTC "Zulu" format, accurate to nanoseconds. Example: "2014-10-02T15:01:23.045123456Z".

trans-unit.source: valid_from - (Optional) The start date and time of the request, in UTC RFC3339 format(for example, YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ). The default is to start fulfilling the request immediately.
trans-unit.target: valid_from -（可选）请求的开始日期和时间，采用UTC RFC3339格式（例如YYYY-MM-DDTHH：MM：SSZ）。默认为立即开始执行请求。

trans-unit.source: valid_to: The time at which the imported key material expires. This value is present only when origin is EXTERNAL and whose expiration_model is KEY_MATERIAL_EXPIRES, otherwise this value is 0
trans-unit.target: valid_to ：导入的密钥材料到期的时间。仅当 origin 为 EXTERNAL 且 expiration_model 为 KEY_MATERIAL_EXPIRES 时才存在此值，否则该值为0

trans-unit.source: valid_until - (Optional) Defines the date and time after which the role's password is no longer valid. Established connections past this valid_time will have to be manually terminated. This value corresponds to a PostgreSQL datetime. If omitted or the magic value NULL is used, valid_until will be set to infinity. Default is NULL, therefore infinity.
trans-unit.target: valid_until -（可选）定义日期和时间，之后角色的密码将不再有效。在此 valid_time 建立的连接将必须手动终止。该值对应于PostgreSQL日期时间。如果省略或使用魔术值 NULL ， valid_until 设置为 infinity 。默认值为 NULL ，因此为 infinity 。

trans-unit.source: valid_until - (Optional) The end date and time of the request, in UTC RFC3339 format(for example, YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ). At this point, no new Spot instance requests are placed or enabled to fulfill the request. Defaults to 24 hours.
trans-unit.target: valid_until -（可选）请求的结束日期和时间，采用UTC RFC3339格式（例如YYYY-MM-DDTHH：MM：SSZ）。此时，不会放置或启用新的竞价型实例请求来满足该请求。默认为24小时。

trans-unit.source: valid_until - (Optional) The end date and time of the request, in UTC RFC3339 format(for example, YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ). At this point, no new Spot instance requests are placed or enabled to fulfill the request. The default end date is 7 days from the current date.
trans-unit.target: valid_until -（可选）请求的结束日期和时间，采用UTC RFC3339格式（例如YYYY-MM-DDTHH：MM：SSZ）。此时，不会放置或启用新的竞价型实例请求来满足该请求。默认的结束日期是从当前日期算起的7天。

trans-unit.source: valid_until - The end date of the request.
trans-unit.target: valid_until -请求的结束日期。

trans-unit.source: valid_until - The expiration date and time for the SAML provider in RFC1123 format, e.g. Mon, 02 Jan 2006 15:04:05 MST.
trans-unit.target: valid_until -SAML提供程序的RFC1123格式的到期日期和时间，例如 Mon, 02 Jan 2006 15:04:05 MST 。

trans-unit.source: ValidateResource is called to do a high-level structural validation of a resource's configuration. The configuration at this point is raw and the interpolations have not been processed. The value of any key is not guaranteed and is just meant to be a quick structural check.
trans-unit.target: ValidateResource 调用 ValidateResource进行资源配置的高级结构验证。此时的配置是原始的，插值尚未处理。不能保证任何密钥的值，只是为了快速进行结构检查。

trans-unit.source: validation_emails - A list of addresses that received a validation E-Mail. Only set if EMAIL-validation was used.
trans-unit.target: validation_emails -收到验证电子邮件的地址列表。仅在使用 EMAIL -validation时设置。

trans-unit.source: validation_method - (Required) Which method to use for validation. DNS or EMAIL are valid, NONE can be used for certificates that were imported into ACM and then into Terraform.
trans-unit.target: validation_method -（必需）用于验证的方法。 DNS 或 EMAIL 有效， NONE 可以用于先导入ACM然后再导入Terraform的证书。

trans-unit.source: validation_record_fqdns - (Optional) List of FQDNs that implement the validation. Only valid for DNS validation method ACM certificates. If this is set, the resource can implement additional sanity checks and has an explicit dependency on the resource that is implementing the validation
trans-unit.target: validation_record_fqdns -（可选）实现验证的FQDN列表。仅对DNS验证方法ACM证书有效。如果设置了此选项，则该资源可以实施其他完整性检查，并且对实施验证的资源具有显式依赖关系

trans-unit.source: -var 'foo=bar' - Set a variable in the Terraform configuration. This flag can be set multiple times. Variable values are interpreted as HCL, so list and map values can be specified via this flag. This is only useful with the -config flag.
trans-unit.target: -var 'foo=bar' 在Terraform配置中设置一个变量。可以多次设置此标志。变量值被解释为 HCL，因此可以通过此标志指定列表和映射值。这仅与 -config 标志一起使用。

trans-unit.source: -var='foo=bar' - Set the value of a variable for the Terraform configuration.
trans-unit.target: -var='foo=bar' 设置Terraform配置变量的值。

trans-unit.source: -var-file=foo - Set the value of variables using a variable file. This flag can be used multiple times.
trans-unit.target: -var-file=foo -使用变量文件设置变量的值。该标志可以多次使用。

trans-unit.source: -var-file=foo - Set variables in the Terraform configuration from a variable file. If "terraform.tfvars" is present, it will be automatically loaded first. Any files specified by -var-file override any values in a "terraform.tfvars". This flag can be used multiple times.
trans-unit.target: -var-file=foo -从变量文件在Terraform配置中设置变量。如果存在“ terraform.tfvars”，它将首先自动加载。 -var-file 指定的任何文件都将覆盖“ terraform.tfvars”中的所有值。该标志可以多次使用。

trans-unit.source: -var-file=foo - Set variables in the Terraform configuration from a variable file. If a terraform.tfvars or any .auto.tfvars files are present in the current directory, they will be automatically loaded. terraform.tfvars is loaded first and the .auto.tfvars files after in alphabetical order. Any files specified by -var-file override any values set automatically from files in the working directory. This flag can be used multiple times.
trans-unit.target: -var-file=foo -从变量文件在Terraform配置中设置变量。如果当前目录中存在 terraform.tfvars 或任何 .auto.tfvars 文件，则将自动加载它们。首先按字母顺序加载 terraform.tfvars ，然后加载 .auto.tfvars 文件。 -var-file 指定的任何文件都会覆盖从工作目录中的文件自动设置的任何值。该标志可以多次使用。

trans-unit.source: -var-file=foo - Set variables in the Terraform configuration from a variable file. If a terraform.tfvars or any .auto.tfvars files are present in the current directory, they will be automatically loaded. terraform.tfvars is loaded first and the .auto.tfvars files after in alphabetical order. Any files specified by -var-file override any values set automatically from files in the working directory. This flag can be used multiple times. This is only useful with the -config flag.
trans-unit.target: -var-file=foo -从变量文件在Terraform配置中设置变量。如果当前目录中存在 terraform.tfvars 或任何 .auto.tfvars 文件，则将自动加载它们。首先按字母顺序加载 terraform.tfvars ，然后加载 .auto.tfvars 文件。 -var-file 指定的任何文件都会覆盖从工作目录中的文件自动设置的任何值。该标志可以多次使用。这仅与 -config 标志一起使用。

trans-unit.source: var.<name> - For each name given, the corresponding attribute has the value of the key.
trans-unit.target: var.<name> -对于给定的每个名称，相应的属性具有键的值。

trans-unit.source: variable (Required) The name of a Context Variable to apply the condition to. Context variables may either be standard AWS variables starting with aws:, or service-specific variables prefixed with the service name.
trans-unit.target: variable （必填）要应用条件的上下文变量的名称。上下文变量可以是以 aws: 开头的标准AWS变量，也可以是带有服务名称前缀的特定于服务的变量。

trans-unit.source: variables - (Optional) A list of variables to extract out of the HTTP response from this request. Variables documented below.
trans-unit.target: variables -（可选）要从此请求的HTTP响应中提取的变量列表。变量记录在下面。

trans-unit.target: variables -（可选）定义阶段变量的映射

trans-unit.target: vars -（可选）要分配给主机的变量映射。

trans-unit.target: vars -（可选）用于模板内插的变量。请注意，变量必须全部为基元。直接引用列表或地图将导致验证错误。

trans-unit.source: vars - See Argument Reference above.
trans-unit.target: vars -请参见上面的参数参考。

trans-unit.target: vault_certificates -（必需）如下所述的保险柜证书的集合

trans-unit.source: vault_json (string) - (Optional) A raw JSON string with Chef Vaults and Items to which the new node should have access. These can also be loaded from a file on disk using the file() interpolation function.
trans-unit.target: vault_json (string) -（可选）新的JSON字符串，其中包含新节点应具有访问权限的Chef Vault和项目。也可以使用 file() 插值函数从磁盘上的文件中加载这些文件。

trans-unit.source: vault_token(string: "") - A vault token to be inserted in the job file. This can also be specified as the VAULT_TOKEN environment variable or using a vault token helper (see Vault's documentation for more details).
trans-unit.target: vault_token (string: "") -要在作业文件中插入的Vault令牌。也可以将其指定为 VAULT_TOKEN 环境变量或使用保管库令牌帮助程序（有关更多详细信息，请参阅 Vault的文档）。

trans-unit.source: vault_uri - (Required) Specifies the URI used to access the Key Vault instance, available on the azurerm_key_vault Data Source / Resource.
trans-unit.target: vault_uri -（必填）指定用于访问Key Vault实例的URI，在 azurerm_key_vault 数据源/资源上可用。

trans-unit.source: vault_uri - (Required) Specifies the URI used to access the Key Vault instance, available on the azurerm_key_vault resource.
trans-unit.target: vault_uri -（必填）指定用于访问Key Vault实例的URI，在 azurerm_key_vault 资源上可用。

trans-unit.source: vault_uri - The URI of the vault for performing operations on keys and secrets.
trans-unit.target: vault_uri -用于对密钥和机密执行操作的库的URI。

trans-unit.source: vcable - (Required) The vcable of the instance to associate to the security list.
trans-unit.target: vcable -（必需）与安全列表关联的实例的 vcable 。

trans-unit.source: vcable - (Required) The vcable of the instance to associate the IP address with.
trans-unit.target: vcable -（必需）与IP地址关联的实例的vcable。

trans-unit.source: vcable_id - vCable ID for the instance.
trans-unit.target: vcable_id -实例的vCable ID。

trans-unit.source: vcl - (Optional) A set of custom VCL configuration blocks. The ability to upload custom VCL code is not enabled by default for new Fastly accounts (see the Fastly documentation for details).
trans-unit.target: vcl -（可选）一组自定义VCL配置块。默认情况下，新的Fastly帐户未启用上传自定义VCL代码的功能（有关详细信息，请参见 Fastly文档）。

trans-unit.source: vcl – Set of custom VCL configurations. See above for details.
trans-unit.target: vcl –一组自定义VCL配置。有关详情，请参见上文。

trans-unit.target: vcores -（可选）vcore数

trans-unit.source: vcpus - See Argument Reference above.

trans-unit.source: -vcs=true - If true (default), then Terraform will detect if a VCS is in use, such as Git, and will only upload files that are committed to version control. If no version control system is detected, Terraform will upload all files in path (parameter to the command).
trans-unit.target: -vcs=true -如果为true（默认值），则Terraform将检测是否正在使用VCS（例如Git），并且仅上载提交给版本控制的文件。如果未检测到版本控制系统，Terraform将在 path （命令参数）中上载所有文件。

trans-unit.source: vdc - (Optional) This is the virtual datacenter within vCloud Director to run API operations against. If not set the plugin will select the first virtual datacenter available to your Org. Can also be specified with the VCD_VDC environment variable.
trans-unit.target: vdc -（可选）这是vCloud Director中用于运行API操作的虚拟数据中心。如果未设置，则插件将选择组织可使用的第一个虚拟数据中心。也可以用 VCD_VDC 环境变量指定。

trans-unit.source: vendor - (Optional) The ID of the vendor the integration should integrate with (e.g Datadog or Amazon Cloudwatch).
trans-unit.target: vendor -（可选）集成应与之集成的供应商的ID（例如Datadog或Amazon Cloudwatch）。

trans-unit.source: vendor_options - (Optional) Map of additional vendor-specific options. Supported options are described below.
trans-unit.target: vendor_options -（可选）其他特定于供应商的选项的映射。支持的选项如下所述。

trans-unit.source: verification - (Optional) The hash of the config, in the form <type>-<value> where type is sha512.
trans-unit.target: verification -（可选）配置的哈希，格式为 <类型>-<值>，类型为sha512。

trans-unit.source: verification_message_template (Optional) - The verification message templates configuration.
trans-unit.target: verification_message_template （可选）-验证消息模板配置。

trans-unit.source: verification_token - A code which when added to the domain as a TXT record will signal to SES that the owner of the domain has authorised SES to act on their behalf. The domain identity will be in state "verification pending" until this is done. See below for an example of how this might be achieved when the domain is hosted in Route 53 and managed by Terraform. Find out more about verifying domains in Amazon SES in the AWS SES docs.
trans-unit.target: verification_token 一种代码，当将其作为TXT记录添加到域时，将向SES发出信号，表明域所有者已授权SES代表其行事。在完成此操作之前，域标识将处于“验证待定”状态。请参阅以下示例，了解如何将域托管在Route 53中并由Terraform管理时如何实现。在 AWS SES文档中找到有关在Amazon SES中验证域的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: verified - Returns true if Datadog user is verified
trans-unit.target: verified -如果已验证Datadog用户，则返回true

trans-unit.source: verified(bool: <optional>) - If true, limits results to only verified modules. Any other value including none returns all modules including verified ones.
trans-unit.target: verified (bool: <optional>) -如果为 true ，则将结果限制为仅已验证模块。任何其他值（包括无）将返回包括已验证模块在内的所有模块。

trans-unit.source: verified(bool: <optional>) - If true, limits results to only verified modules. Any other value including none returns all modules including verified ones.
trans-unit.target: verified (bool: <optional>) -如果为 true ，则将结果限制为仅已验证模块。任何其他值（包括无）将返回包括已验证模块在内的所有模块。

trans-unit.source: version – (Optional) Desired Kubernetes master version. If you do not specify a value, the latest available version is used.
trans-unit.target: version -（可选）所需的Kubernetes主版本。如果未指定值，则使用最新的可用版本。

trans-unit.source: version - (Optional) - The version of the DVS to create. The default is to create the DVS at the latest version supported by the version of vSphere being used. A DVS can be upgraded to another version, but cannot be downgraded.
trans-unit.target: version -（可选）-要创建的DVS的版本。默认情况下，将使用所使用的vSphere版本支持的最新版本创建DVS。DVS可以升级到另一个版本，但不能降级。

trans-unit.source: version - (Optional) A version constraint string that specifies which versions of the referenced module are acceptable. The newest version matching the constraint will be used. version is supported only for modules retrieved from module registries.
trans-unit.target: version -（可选）版本约束字符串，用于指定所引用模块的哪些版本是可接受的。将使用与约束匹配的最新版本。仅从模块注册表中检索的模块支持 version 。

trans-unit.source: version - (Optional) Application versions managed by this instance group. Each version deals with a specific instance template, allowing canary release scenarios. Conflicts with instance_template. Structure is documented below. Beware that exactly one version must not specify a target size. It means that versions with a target size will respect the setting, and the one without target size will be applied to all remaining Instances (top level target_size - each version target_size).
trans-unit.target: version -（可选）此实例组管理的应用程序版本。每个版本都处理一个特定的实例模板，允许使用金丝雀发布方案。与 instance_template 冲突。结构记录在下面。注意，一个版本不能指定目标大小。这意味着具有目标大小的版本将遵守该设置，而没有目标大小的版本将应用于所有其余实例（顶级target_size-每个版本target_size）。

trans-unit.source: version_stage - (Optional) Specifies the secret version that you want to retrieve by the staging label attached to the version. Defaults to AWSCURRENT.

trans-unit.source: version_stages - (Optional) Specifies a list of staging labels that are attached to this version of the secret. A staging label must be unique to a single version of the secret. If you specify a staging label that's already associated with a different version of the same secret then that staging label is automatically removed from the other version and attached to this version. If you do not specify a value, then AWS Secrets Manager automatically moves the staging label AWSCURRENT to this new version on creation.
trans-unit.target: version_stages -（可选）指定此秘密版本附加的暂存标签列表。暂存标签对于秘密的单个版本必须是唯一的。如果您指定了已经与同一机密的其他版本关联的暂存标签，则该暂存标签会自动从其他版本中删除并附加到该版本。如果您未指定值，则AWS Secrets Manager会在创建时自动将登台标签 AWSCURRENT 移至该新版本。

trans-unit.source: vip_address - (Optional) Specifies the IP address provided by ELB. When type is set to External, the value of this parameter is the elastic IP address. When type is set to Internal, the value of this parameter is the private network IP address. You can select an existing elastic IP address and create a public network load balancer. When this parameter is configured, parameter bandwidth is invalid.
trans-unit.target: vip_address -（可选）指定ELB提供的IP地址。当type设置为External时，此参数的值为弹性IP地址。当type设置为Internal时，此参数的值为私有网络IP地址。您可以选择一个现有的弹性IP地址并创建一个公共网络负载平衡器。配置此参数后，参数带宽无效。

trans-unit.source: vip_address - (Optional) Specifies the IP address provided by ELB. When type is set to External, the value of this parameter is the elastic IP address. When type is set to Internal, the value of this parameter is the private network IP address. You can select an existing elastic IP address and create a public network load balancer. When this parameter is configured, parameter bandwidth is invalid. Changing this creates a new elb loadbalancer.
trans-unit.target: vip_address -（可选）指定ELB提供的IP地址。当type设置为External时，此参数的值为弹性IP地址。当type设置为Internal时，此参数的值为私有网络IP地址。您可以选择一个现有的弹性IP地址并创建一个公共网络负载平衡器。配置此参数后，参数带宽无效。更改此设置将创建一个新的Elb负载平衡器。

trans-unit.source: vip_address - (Optional) Specifies the IP address provided by ELB. When typeis set to External, the value of this parameter is the elastic IP address. When type is set to Internal, the value of this parameter is the private network IP address. You can select an existing elastic IP address and create a public network load balancer. When this parameter is configured, parameters bandwidth, charge_mode, and eip_type are invalid.
trans-unit.target: vip_address -（可选）指定ELB提供的IP地址。当type设置为External时，此参数的值为弹性IP地址。当type设置为Internal时，此参数的值为私有网络IP地址。您可以选择一个现有的弹性IP地址并创建一个公共网络负载平衡器。配置此参数后，带宽，charge_mode和eip_type参数无效。

trans-unit.source: vsys - (Required) The vsys that will use this interface. This should be something like vsys1 or vsys3.

trans-unit.source: vsys - (Required) The vsys that will use this virtual router. This should be something like vsys1 or vsys3.
trans-unit.target: vsys -（必需）将使用此虚拟路由器的vsys。这应该类似于 vsys1 或 vsys3 。

trans-unit.source: vsys_list - (Optional) A subset of all available vsys on the firewall that should be in this device group. If the firewall is a virtual firewall, then this parameter should just be omitted.
trans-unit.target: vsys_list -（可选）应该在此设备组中的防火墙上所有可用vsys的子集。如果防火墙是虚拟防火墙，则应忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: vulnerability - (Optional) Profile Setting: Profiles - The Vulnerability Protection setting.
trans-unit.target: vulnerability -（可选）配置文件设置： Profiles -漏洞保护设置。

trans-unit.source: waf_configuration - (Optional) Web Application Firewall configuration settings. The waf_configuration block supports fields documented below.
trans-unit.target: waf_configuration -（可选）Web应用程序防火墙配置设置。所述 waf_configuration 块支持字段下面介绍。

trans-unit.source: wait_for_capacity_timeout (Default: "10m") A maximum duration that Terraform should wait for ASG instances to be healthy before timing out. (See also Waiting for Capacity below.) Setting this to "0" causes Terraform to skip all Capacity Waiting behavior.
trans-unit.target: wait_for_capacity_timeout （默认值：“ 10m”）Terraform在超时之前应等待ASG实例运行正常的最大持续时间。（另请参见下面的“等待容量”。）将此值设置为“ 0”会使Terraform跳过所有“容量等待”行为。

trans-unit.source: wait_for_elb_capacity - (Optional) Setting this will cause Terraform to wait for exactly this number of healthy instances in all attached load balancers on both create and update operations. (Takes precedence over min_elb_capacity behavior.) (See also Waiting for Capacity below.)
trans-unit.target: wait_for_elb_capacity -（可选）设置此项将导致Terraform在创建和更新操作上，在所有连接的负载均衡器中恰好等待一定数量的正常实例。（优先于 min_elb_capacity 行为。）（另请参见下面的“等待容量”。）

trans-unit.source: wait_for_fulfillment - (Optional; Default: false) If set, Terraform will wait for the Spot Request to be fulfilled, and will throw an error if the timeout of 10m is reached.
trans-unit.target: wait_for_fulfillment -（可选；默认值：false）如果设置，Terraform将等待现场请求得到满足，并且如果达到10m的超时将抛出错误。

trans-unit.source: wait_for_guest_net_routable - (Optional) Controls whether or not the guest network waiter waits for a routable address. When false, the waiter does not wait for a default gateway, nor are IP addresses checked against any discovered default gateways as part of its success criteria. Default: true.
trans-unit.target: wait_for_guest_net_routable -（可选）控制来宾网络服务员是否等待可路由的地址。如果为 false ，那么服务员将不等待默认网关，也不会根据发现的默认网关检查IP地址作为其成功标准的一部分。默认值： true 。

trans-unit.source: wait_for_guest_net_timeout - (Optional) The amount of time, in minutes, to wait for an available IP address on this virtual machine. A value less than 1 disables the waiter. Default: 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: wait_for_guest_net_timeout -（可选）在此虚拟机上等待可用IP地址的时间（以分钟为单位）。小于1的值将禁用侍者。默认值：5分钟。

trans-unit.source: wait_for_instances - (Optional) Whether to wait for all instances to be created/updated before returning. Note that if this is set to true and the operation does not succeed, Terraform will continue trying until it times out.
trans-unit.target: wait_for_instances -（可选）在返回之前是否等待所有实例的创建/更新。请注意，如果将其设置为true并且该操作没有成功，则Terraform将继续尝试直到超时。

trans-unit.source: wait_for_ready_timeout - (Default: 20m) The maximum duration that Terraform should wait for an Elastic Beanstalk Environment to be in a ready state before timing out.
trans-unit.target: wait_for_ready_timeout -（默认值： 20m ）Terraform在超时之前应等待Elastic Beanstalk环境处于就绪状态的最大持续时间。

trans-unit.source: wait_index - (Optional) Index number used to enable blocking quereis.
trans-unit.target: wait_index -（可选）用于启用阻塞查询的索引号。

trans-unit.source: wait_time - (Optional) Max time the client should wait for a blocking query to return.
trans-unit.target: wait_time -（可选）客户端应等待阻塞查询返回的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: wait_time_in_minutes - (Optional) The number of minutes to wait before the status of a blue/green deployment changed to Stopped if rerouting is not started manually. Applies only to the STOP_DEPLOYMENT option for action_on_timeout.
trans-unit.target: wait_time_in_minutes -（可选）如果未手动启动重新路由，则蓝/绿色部署状态更改为“已停止”之前要等待的分钟数。仅适用于 STOP_DEPLOYMENT 的选项 action_on_timeout 。

trans-unit.source: wait_until_associated - (Optional) In cases where the OpenStack environment does not automatically wait until the association has finished, set this option to have Terraform poll the instance until the floating IP has been associated. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: wait_until_associated -（可选）在OpenStack环境在关联完成之前不会自动等待的情况下，请将此选项设置为Terraform轮询实例，直到关联了浮动IP。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: wait_until_bound - (Optional) Whether to wait for the claim to reach Bound state (to find volume in which to claim the space)
trans-unit.target: wait_until_bound -（可选）是否等待声明到达“ Bound 状态（查找声明空间的卷）

trans-unit.source: wallet_file_content - (Optional) String containing the xsd:base64Binary representation of the cloud backup's wallet file. This wallet is used to decrypt the backup. Specify either ibkup_decryption_key or ibkup_wallet_file_content for decrypting the backup.
trans-unit.target: wallet_file_content -（可选）包含xsd： base64云备份的钱包文件的二进制表示形式的字符串。该钱包用于解密备份。指定 ibkup_decryption_key 或 ibkup_wallet_file_content 来解密备份。

trans-unit.source: warning - (Optional) Identifies the warning threshold parameters. See Thresholds below for details.
trans-unit.target: warning -（可选）标识警告阈值参数。有关详细信息，请参见下面的阈值。

trans-unit.source: warning - (Required)
trans-unit.target: warning -（必填）

trans-unit.source: warning - The topic ARN for the Amazon SNS topic that you want to notify when Elastic Transcoder encounters a warning condition while processing a job in this pipeline.
trans-unit.target: warning -当Elastic Transcoder在此管道中处理作业时遇到警告条件时，您要通知的Amazon SNS主题的ARN主题。

trans-unit.source: web_acl_id (Optional) - If you're using AWS WAF to filter CloudFront requests, the Id of the AWS WAF web ACL that is associated with the distribution.
trans-unit.target: web_acl_id （可选）-如果您使用AWS WAF过滤CloudFront请求，则为与该分配关联的AWS WAF Web ACL的ID。

trans-unit.source: yaxis - (Optional) Nested block describing modifications to the yaxis rendering. The structure of this block is described below.

trans-unit.source: zipmap(list, list) - Creates a map from a list of keys and a list of values. The keys must all be of type string, and the length of the lists must be the same. For example, to output a mapping of AWS IAM user names to the fingerprint of the key used to encrypt their initial password, you might use: zipmap(aws_iam_user.users.*.name, aws_iam_user_login_profile.users.*.key_fingerprint).
trans-unit.target: zipmap(list, list) -从键列表和值列表创建映射。键必须全部为字符串类型，并且列表的长度必须相同。例如，要输出AWS IAM用户名到用于加密其初始密码的密钥的指纹的映射，您可以使用： zipmap(aws_iam_user.users.*.name, aws_iam_user_login_profile.users.*.key_fingerprint) 。

trans-unit.source: zone (required) - Zone to list available cluster versions for. Should match the zone the cluster will be deployed in.
trans-unit.target: zone （必需）-列出可用群集版本的区域。应与将在其中部署群集的区域匹配。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Optional) The name or ID of the zone for which an IP address should be acquired and associated. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
trans-unit.target: zone -（可选）应为其获取IP地址并将其关联的区域的名称或ID。更改此选项将强制创建新资源。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Optional) The preferred compute engine zone.
trans-unit.target: zone -（可选）首选的计算引擎区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Optional) The zone in which the cluster resides.
trans-unit.target: zone -（可选）群集所在的区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Optional) The zone in which the created job should run. If it is not provided, the provider zone is used.
trans-unit.target: zone -（可选）创建的作业应在其中运行的区域。如果未提供，则使用提供者区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Optional) The zone of the instance group. If referencing the instance group by name and zone is not provided, the provider zone is used.
trans-unit.target: zone -（可选）实例组的区域。如果未按名称和 zone 引用实例组，则使用提供者区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Optional) The zone that the master and the number of nodes specified in initial_node_count should be created in. Only one of zone and region may be set. If neither zone nor region are set, the provider zone is used.
trans-unit.target: zone -（可选）应在其中创建主节点和在 initial_node_count 中指定的节点数的 zone 。只能设置 zone和 region 中的一个。如果既未设置区域，又未设置区域，则使用提供者区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Optional) The zone to operate under, if not specified by a given resource. This can also be specified using any of the following environment variables (listed in order of precedence):
trans-unit.target: zone -（可选）给定资源未指定要在其下运行的区域。也可以使用以下任何环境变量（按优先顺序列出）来指定：

trans-unit.source: zone - (Optional, Computed) The GCP zone where your data is stored and used (i.e. where the master and the worker nodes will be created in). If region is set to 'global' (default) then zone is mandatory, otherwise GCP is able to make use of Auto Zone Placement to determine this automatically for you. Note: This setting additionally determines and restricts which computing resources are available for use with other configs such as cluster_config.master_config.machine_type and cluster_config.worker_config.machine_type.
trans-unit.target: zone -（可选，已计算）存储和使用数据的GCP区域（即将在其中创建主节点和工作节点的区域）。如果 region 设置为“ global”（默认），则 zone 为必填项，否则GCP可以使用“自动区域放置”来自动为您确定。注意：此设置还确定并限制哪些计算资源可用于其他配置，例如 cluster_config.master_config.machine_type 和 cluster_config.worker_config.machine_type 。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) DNS zone the record belongs to. It must be an FQDN, that is, include the trailing dot.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必需）记录所属的DNS区域。它必须是FQDN，即包括尾随点。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) DNS zone the record set belongs to. It must be an FQDN, that is, include the trailing dot.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必需）记录集所属的DNS区域。它必须是FQDN，即包括尾随点。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The DNS zone to add the record to.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必填）要将记录添加到的DNS区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The DNS zone to apply rate limiting to.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必需）要对其应用速率限制的DNS区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The domain name of the zone.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必填）区域的域名。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The domain of the pool to probe.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必需）要探测的池的域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The domain to add the record to
trans-unit.target: zone -（必填）要将记录添加到的域

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The name of zone to contain this record.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必填）包含此记录的区域的名称。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The name or ID of the zone where this disk volume will be available. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必填）此磁盘卷可用的区域的名称或ID。更改此选项将强制创建新资源。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The name or ID of the zone where this instance will be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必填）将在其中创建此实例的区域的名称或ID。更改此选项将强制创建新资源。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The name or ID of the zone where this network will be available. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必填）此网络可用的区域的名称或ID。更改此选项将强制创建新资源。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The name or ID of the zone where this template will be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必填）将在其中创建此模板的区域的名称或ID。更改此选项将强制创建新资源。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The zone of the target.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必需）目标区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The zone that instances in this group should be created in.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必填）应在此组中创建实例的区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The zone that the machine should be created in.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必需）应在其中创建计算机的区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The zone that this instance group should be created in.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必需）应在其中创建此实例组的区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The zone the record belongs to.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必填）记录所属的区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The zone to add the load balancer to.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必需）要将负载均衡器添加到的区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The zone to create the Cloud Bigtable cluster in. Zones that support Bigtable instances are noted on the Cloud Bigtable locations page.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必需）在其中创建Cloud Bigtable集群的区域。“ Cloud Bigtable位置”页面上记录了支持Bigtable实例的区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The zone to which the page rule should be added.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必填）应将页面规则添加到的区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Required) The zone where the source disk is located.
trans-unit.target: zone -（必填）源磁盘所在的区域。

trans-unit.source: zone or region - The zone or region this cluster has been created in.
trans-unit.target: zone 或 region -已在其中创建群集的区域或区域。

trans-unit.source: zone - See Argument Reference above.
trans-unit.target: zone -见参数参考以上。

trans-unit.source: zone - The domain of the record
trans-unit.target: zone -记录的域

trans-unit.source: zone_awareness_enabled - (Optional) Indicates whether zone awareness is enabled.
trans-unit.target: zone_awareness_enabled -（可选）指示是否启用区域识别。

trans-unit.source: zone_id - (Optional) The Hosted Zone id of the desired Hosted Zone.
trans-unit.target: zone_id -（可选）所需托管区域的托管区域ID。

trans-unit.source: zone_id - (Optional) The Zone to launch the DB instance. From version 1.8.1, it supports multiple zone. If it is a multi-zone and vswitch_id is specified, the vswitch must in the one of them. The multiple zone ID can be retrieved by setting multi to "true" in the data source alicloud_zones.
trans-unit.target: zone_id -（可选）启动数据库实例的区域。从1.8.1版开始，它支持多个区域。如果它是一个多区域，并且指定了 vswitch_id ，则vswitch必须位于其中之一。可以通过在数据源 alicloud_zones 中将 multi 设置为“ true”来检索多个区域ID。

trans-unit.source: zone_id - (Optional) The availability zone for one vswitch.
trans-unit.target: zone_id -（可选）一个vswitch的可用区。

trans-unit.source: zone_id - (Required) Route53 hosted zone ID to enable query logs.
trans-unit.target: zone_id - （必需）Route53托管区域ID，使查询日志。

trans-unit.source: zone_id - (Required) The ID of the hosted zone to contain this record.
trans-unit.target: zone_id -（必填）包含此记录的托管区域的ID。

trans-unit.source: zone_id - (Required) The ID of the zone in which to create the record set. Changing this creates a new DNS record set.
trans-unit.target: zone_id -（必填）在其中创建记录集的区域的ID。更改此设置将创建一个新的DNS记录集。

trans-unit.source: zone_id - (Required) The private hosted zone to associate.
trans-unit.target: zone_id -（必需）要关联的私有托管区域。

trans-unit.target: zone_id -与指定 zone 关联的ID。

trans-unit.target: zone_id -DNS区域ID。
